apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji captures a tender moment between two women, one with a medium-light skin tone and the other with a light skin tone, sharing a kiss. Their faces are rendered with Appleâ€™s characteristic soft shading and realistic lighting, highlighting the gentle curves and affectionate expressions. A subtle blush and the soft focus on their lips convey intimacy and romance, making it a heartfelt way to express love and closeness.
